import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, Col, Container, Row, Table } from "reactstrap"; import { Edit2, Trash } from "react-feather"; import avatar1 from "../../assets/img/avatars/avatar.jpg"; import avatar2 from "../../assets/img/avatars/avatar-2.jpg"; import avatar3 from "../../assets/img/avatars/avatar-3.jpg"; import avatar4 from "../../assets/img/avatars/avatar-4.jpg"; class PersonList extends React.Component { state = { persons: [] } componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/todos/") .then(res => { const persons = res.data; this.setState({ persons }); }) } render() { return ( { this.state.persons.map((person, key) => {person.title} key={person.id}>{person.description} )} ) } } const BasicTable = () => ( Basic Table
